name: Deceiving Delivery
description:
Deceiving Delivery

DISCLAIMER: DOWNLOADABLE VERSION IS WAY HIGHER QUALITY.

It was made for the Ben Bonk Jam #1 with the theme of "Trust No One".

You're a messenger who's been hired by a Wizard to send a letter to another Wizard. He tells you the journey will be easy but can you really trust a random stranger?

Can you Successfully Deliver the Letter?

3D Platformer - WASD For movement & Space to Jump

Everything was made by our team in the game during the time limit from the scripts, art & music except the skybox which is a free asset in the Unity Asset Store and mainmenu scrolling background (free to use image).

Made By,

RaidenNnigh - Programmer
Micnasr - Programmer
Krazzett - Programmer
